issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
On HTC Explorer 2.3.5 when attempting to open an image >1mb in Photogallery an error is thrown due to lack of available memory.

Screenshot of error message attached.
fields.summary: Device throws an error when large images are handled.

comments.body: Resolving this as per updated test results. We tested the issue with TISDK 3.2GA and we could not reproduce it.

Verified FIXED using :

Appc Studio: 3.2.3.201404162038
SDK build: 3.2.3.v20140417162517, 3.3.0.v20140417173316 and 3.2.0 GA
acs: 1.0.14
npm: 1.3.2
alloy:1.3.1
CLI: titanium@3.2.3-beta
titanium-code-processor:1.1.1-beta1
Xcode: 5.1.1
Osx: Mavericks(10.9.2)
Device: Nexus 7 (4.3) and Nexus 5 (4.4.2)

Image is viewed correctly. Hence closed.
